We are happy to annouce the release of our first open source software, Stoop. Based on an existing Haskell library, Stoop is a Scala DSL for interfacing with CouchDB. Implementation can be easily switched between talking to an actual Couch or a fake (mock) one for testing. Weâ€™ve released this under the Modified BSD License, so check it out and let us know if you have any questions, if you find bugs, or even if you have a pull request to fix something!
